video.title: Understanding webpack from the inside out
video.description:
webpack is a JavaScript module bundler that has taken the world by storm. This talk by a webpack maintainer covers webpack from the inside-out. You'll learn how to write custom plugins and leverage this powerful tool to work seamlessly with your tech stack and development workflow. 

Talk given by Sean Larkin & Tobias Koppers at ReactConf 2017

Thanks to ReactiveConf for giving us permission to post this talk. freeCodeCamp is not associated with this talk. We're just excited to bring more exposure to to it!

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.com

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.com

topLevelComment.author: Software Space
topLevelComment.text: Great speakers! Wow, these guys are so amazing! Really cool and interesting stuff, even if it's old. Niiice.

topLevelComment.author: Yevgen Gorbunkov
topLevelComment.text: Want to know about how exactly Webpack works under the hood? Pff, no big deal, all it takes is 20 minutes of your time and one crappy presentation.

topLevelComment.author: Utkarsh Kukreti
topLevelComment.text: Third class delivery of the content

topLevelComment.text: can i get the slides used in the videos any one share me any link

topLevelComment.author: Moh Jawad Reza B
topLevelComment.text: the guy did not even prepare for the presentation.

topLevelComment.author: Tekk
topLevelComment.text: Tobias Koppers, the founder of webpack, codes JS as a hobby and created webpack for a web project he was making for his thesis. So jealous of this kind of genius.

replies.author: Keepitfresh02
replies.text: yeah. I feel like in my city companies are looking for this type of developer. I just like to code with cool tech but I like to do other things in my life so im not going to be building the next platform to change the world.
